advisories.impact: An app may be able to access user-sensitive data
advisories.description: This issue was addressed by enabling hardened runtime.
Multiple issues were addressed by updating to curl version 7.86.0.
Multiple issues were addressed by updating to curl version 7.85.0.

advisories.impact: Mounting a maliciously crafted Samba network share may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A buffer overflow issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: Dimitrios Tatsis and Aleksandar Nikolic of Cisco Talos

advisories.impact: An encrypted volume may be unmounted and remounted by a different user without prompting for the password
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A type confusion issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved bounds checks.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to determine kernel memory layout
advisories.description: An information disclosure issue was addressed by removing the vulnerable code.

cves.credit: Pan ZhenPeng (@Peterpan0927) of STAR Labs SG Pte. Ltd. (@starlabs_sg)

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access mail folder attachments through a temporary directory used during compression
advisories.description: An access issue was addressed with improved access restrictions.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to gain root privileges
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access information about a user’s contacts
advisories.description: A privacy issue was addressed with improved private data redaction for log entries.

cves.credit: Wojciech Regula of SecuRing (wojciechregula.blog) and Csaba Fitzl (@theevilbit) of Offensive Security

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access user-sensitive data
advisories.description: This issue was addressed by removing the vulnerable code.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to bypass Privacy preferences
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: Wojciech Regula of SecuRing (wojciechregula.blog), an anonymous researcher

advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: YeongHyeon Choi (@hyeon101010), Hyeon Park (@tree_segment), SeOk JEON (@_seokjeon), YoungSung Ahn (@_ZeroSung), JunSeo Bae (@snakebjs0107), Dohyun Lee (@l33d0hyun) of Team ApplePIE
YeongHyeon Choi (@hyeon101010), Hyeon Park (@tree_segment), SeOk JEON (@_seokjeon), YoungSung Ahn (@_ZeroSung), JunSeo Bae (@snakebjs0107), Dohyun Lee (@l33d0hyun) of Team ApplePIE

advisories.impact: An app may be able to bypass Privacy preferences
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.
